venue.name: The Center for Arts in Natick

item.description:
5th annual

Chocolate Festival


Sunday-March 30,2008

1-3 pm

TCAN

(The Center for Arts in Natick ? Summer Street)

Music by Summer Street Band


Admission $10, 5 & under free

Tickets available at Jones Drug, Stop & Shop,

Kids Connect & at the door

Call 508-652-4211 for more information


Last year the kids had a great time with the chocolate fountain. check out the pictures http://divorcesupport...
item.why: Because a week after Easter and we still have not had enough chocolate. We never get enough :)
